attributes.action: Ban Fallout Boy and Panic! At The Disco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fallout Boy are responsible for  "the worst song ever written". Panic At The Disco are just a cheaper version of Fallout Boy. It is for these reasons that we call upon the Prime Minister ton ban both groups from entering the UK. we also request that he bans any merchandise featuring the images, names, slogans and/or logos of the bands. It should also be made a criminal offence to listen to or distribute any music from either band

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
